TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract UCOMIConnectionPointContainer

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações, consulte a documentação existente para `IConnectionPointContainer` na subpasta da biblioteca MSDN.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumConnectionPoints([out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumConnectionPoints& ppEnum) cil managed
Public Sub EnumConnectionPoints (ByRef ppEnum As UCOMIEnumConnectionPoints)

param.name: ppEnum
param.span: No retorno bem-sucedido, contém o ponteiro de interface do enumerador.

span.span: On successful return, contains the interface pointer of the enumerator.

summary.span: Cria um enumerador de todos os pontos de conexão com suporte no objeto conectável, um ponto de conexão por IID.

span.span: Creates an enumerator of all the connection points supported in the connectable object, one connection point per IID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações, consulte a documentação existente para `IConnectionPointContainer::EnumConnectionPoints` na biblioteca MSDN.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::EnumConnectionPoints` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void FindConnectionPoint (ref Guid riid, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint ppCP);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FindConnectionPoint(valuetype System.Guid& riid, [out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint& ppCP) cil managed
Public Sub FindConnectionPoint (ByRef riid As Guid, ByRef ppCP As UCOMIConnectionPoint)

param.name: riid
param.span: Uma referência para a interface de saída IID cujo ponto de conexão está sendo solicitado.

span.span: A reference to the outgoing interface IID whose connection point is being requested.

param.name: ppCP
param.span: No retorno bem-sucedido, contém o ponto de conexão que gerencia a interface de saída riid.

span.span: On successful return, contains the connection point that manages the outgoing interface riid.

summary.span: Pergunta ao o objeto conectável se ele tem um ponto de conexão para um IID específico e, nesse caso, retorna o ponteiro de interface desse ponto de conexão.

span.span: Asks the connectable object if it has a connection point for a particular IID, and if so, returns the interface pointer to that connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações, consulte a documentação existente para `IConnectionPointContainer::FindConnectionPoint` na biblioteca MSDN.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::FindConnectionPoint` in the MSDN library.
